Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when account owner has only one company with marketing consent is expected to equal true
Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when account owner has only one company without marketing consent is expected to equal false

Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when account owner has only one company when the account owner changes their email address after signing up is expected to equal true
Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when account owner has only one company when marketing consent cannot be found is expected to equal false

Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when the owner has multiple companies when the latest marketing consent was positive for the oldest company is expected to equal true

Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when the owner has multiple companies when the latest marketing consent was positive for the newest company is expected to equal true

Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when the owner has multiple companies when the latest marketing consent was negative for the oldest company is expected to equal false

Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when the owner has multiple companies when the latest marketing consent was negative for the newest company is expected to equal false

Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when the owner has multiple companies when the two companies have the same account owner emails but different activated signup emails for the oldest company is expected to equal true

Preferences::CommercialProposition private .assumed_marketing_consent when the owner has multiple companies when the two companies have the same account owner emails but different activated signup emails for the newest company is expected to equal true
Property global ownerships settings index destroy action destroys the ownership
Property global ownerships settings edit remove a second ownership destroys the ownership after confirming
Property global ownerships settings edit remove owner row from an ownership can remove an owner row
Property global ownerships settings edit remove owner row from an ownership can add new owner row
Property global ownerships settings add a new ownership can add and remove rows
Property global ownerships settings add a new ownership with multiple users can add and remove rows
SalesTaxEffects::CreditNoteReconciliationEntryCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when sales tax effects are correct behaves like no check errors doesn't report any failure

examples.description: representing non-category expense (purchase of capital asset, including deprecation)
examples.full_description: UkAccountsMapper Accounts Mapper for UK companies who are VAT registered on the invoice accounting basis not on the Flat Rate Scheme Bank Account Entries representing non-category expense (purchase of capital asset, including deprecation)

examples.description: returns a category defined on the Insight model
examples.full_description: Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip behaves like a pro tip rule behaves like a ping rule #category returns a category defined on the Insight model
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip behaves like a pro tip rule behaves like a ping rule #send_notifications? returns a boolean
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip behaves like a pro tip rule #category returns 'pro_tip'
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip.feature_flag returns the correct flag
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip.triggering_events contains exactly the correct events
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip.priority is medium priority
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip#pro_tip_applies? when a company has never created an invoice returns false
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip#pro_tip_applies? when a company has created an invoice previously returns true
Radar::Insights::Rules::InvoiceCustomisationProTip#pro_tip_applies? when a company has created an invoice previously but they have also uploaded a logo returns false

examples.description: displays an info message about no invoice items
examples.full_description: InvoicesController GET :show with a newly created invoice with no invoice items displays an info message about no invoice items
InvoicesController GET :show for an invoice that is marked as sent as a support session user shows the 'Edit' button
